content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Purchase to unlock the full game, or download the demo to play multiplayer for free!

Get unlimited access (no time limits or level caps) to epic 5v5 multiplayer battles that your fellow PlayStation players have rated as 5 – stars.

Choose from a rotation of 30 unique heroes. Love a hero? Permanently unlock and customize your favorites via in-game purchases, or upgrade to the full game to unlock all 25 launch heroes and the PvE story mode, or the Season Pass to unlock all 5 post-launch heroes and story operations.

All trial progression, including player profiles, Hero stats and masteries, will carry over to the full game and Season Pass if purchased. Prior Hero purchases will be refunded the in-game currency value of those Heroes when upgrading to the full game or Season pass.

IN THE FULL GAME
Battle alone or with friends in story mode. Protect the universe’s very last star from a mysterious evil in this Hero Shooter by the creators of Borderlands.

PS4™ Pro: Enhanced graphics with supported game resolutions of 1080p at 60fps or 4k at 30fps.



Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).


1-5 players
Network Players 2-10
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output
Online Play (Required)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
